text: Median white blood cell count was 15,750 Ã 10 9 cells/l (IQR: 10,000-25,700, mean: 20,600 Ã 10 9 cells/l), and median neutrophil percentage was 52.5% (IQR: 31-68, mean: 50.3%). X-rays showed generalized, dense, homogeneous opacification in 24 (20.3%) patients, interstitial syndrome in 24 (20.5%), and alveolar infiltrate in 65 (55.1%), without significant differences according to the pattern of infection (viral, bacterial or mixed). No patient had abscess or pneumothorax, but 4 (3.4%) had pleural effusion.
